title: stuck in low priority queue
body:
ok so i got placed into low priority queue for no reason at all i idle for about 2-3mins in base max and i get a 40 min queue time from leave buster that just resets over and over and over and has no end to it been like this the past 6 hours it never matches me with a game at all 
how the fuck do you get rid of this bullshit

replies.body: Did you guys manage to resolve this problem i have it for 2 months now and no progress is made,this is retarded really i hope we get compensated for this
wow not a single reply from riot on this issue %%%% the lot of you %%%%%%s at riot sack of %%%% company
same....riot hasn't responded to this....they better gift us with rp for this
Im Dealing with the same shît, I Feel You.
